Foreign diplomats visit Korean Computer Center
articles.content:
Foreign diplomats visit Korean Computer Center 
    Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- Diplomatic envoys and staff members of the Cuban, Egyptian, Palestinian, Syrian and Libyan embassies here visited the Korean Computer Center on June 26 on the occasion of the 39th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
 They went round rooms of the center, being briefed on the fact that the center has greatly contributed to the computerization of the national economy and the development of program technology since it was set up as a creditable center of scientific and technological industry of the country under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.

Congratulations to Latvian President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Latvian President
    Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent a congratulatory message to Vaira Vike-Freiberga upon her reelection as President of Latvia.
 In the message Kim expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to develop on good terms and wished the president greater success in her responsible work for the country's prosperity and people's well-being.
